name: stickies
title: Stickies
description: Manage and display macOS's built-in Stickies via Raycast
author: koinzhang

preferences.name: quitWhenNoWindows
preferences.title: Advanced
preferences.label: Quit Stickies When No Windows
preferences.description: Automatically quit Stickies when there are no windows left.

preferences.name: autoOpen
preferences.title: Advanced
preferences.label: Auto Open Stickies
preferences.description: Automatically open Stickies when the extension is activated and Stickies is not running.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
